content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In six months, EPAM designed and built the first version of Mod Marketplace. It became an integral part of the games store, launcher, and dev portal helping the clientâ€™s community to contribute to their favorite games.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With this new capability, the games store leveled out with other industry-standard digital storefronts: the system supports about 10,000 Mod submissions per minute.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":70946,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7a94550e-2f17-4de6-951b-e2ad5aa086be/image2021-2-8_14-12-23.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7a94550e-2f17-4de6-951b-e2ad5aa086be/image2021-2-8_14-12-23.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"image2021-2-8_14-12-23.png\",\"name\":\"image2021-2-8_14-12-23.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7a94550e-2f17-4de6-951b-e2ad5aa086be\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":502,\"height\":327},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
